attributes.action: Prevent Housing associations forcing Choice based letting on people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Whilst we will be happy to reconsider hosting an e-petition on this subject if it was re-drafted as a general query rather then as a personal case, may I also suggest that you contact the Department of Communities and Local Government direct with your concerns.  You can find their contact details at: http://www.communities.gov.uk/corporate/contact
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
